title: EcoFlow Launched DELTA 2 Max - The Ultimate Portable Power Station to Power Every Day for 10 Years - PR Newswire
summary: EcoFlow has launched the DELTA 2 Max, a portable power station designed for long-lasting use, with a capacity that can be customized and expanded. It features fast charging capabilities and can power a wide range of appliances, promoting energy efficiency. The product is marketed as eco-friendly and offers solutions for reducing energy costs, reinforcing EcoFlow's commitment to sustainable energy. Available for purchase at the end of May, it comes with various incentives for early customers.
green_innovation: TRUE: The DELTA 2 Max promotes environmental sustainability through its efficient energy storage and usage, allowing consumers to reduce reliance on traditional energy sources.
business_innovation: TRUE: The DELTA 2 Max is a new product that significantly differs from previous offerings in the market and fulfills the needs of customers seeking energy-efficient solutions.
green_product: TRUE: The DELTA 2 Max is designed and manufactured to reduce environmental impact through its energy-efficient features and compatibility with solar energy.
green_process: TRUE: The production and functionality of the DELTA 2 Max minimize environmental impact by promoting renewable energy use and reducing reliance on non-renewable resources.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 335999 - All Other Miscellaneous Electrical Equipment and Component Manufacturing, 423690 - Other Electronic Parts and Equipment Merchant Wholesalers, 335211 - Computer and Computer Peripheral Equipment Manufacturing, 335999 - Other Communication and Energy Wire Manufacturing.
greenwashing: FALSE: There is no indication of greenwashing as the article details specific benefits and features of the DELTA 2 Max that align with sustainability goals, without misleading information.

title: EcoFlow Expands European Reach with PowerStream Balcony Solar System and EU Headquarters in DÃ¼sseldorf - PR Newswire
summary: EcoFlow launched the EcoFlow PowerStream, a balcony solar system with a portable power station, designed to provide access to solar energy while reducing energy bills and serving as backup power. This system includes components like solar panels, Smart Plugs, and an app for monitoring energy usage. It marks EcoFlow's entry into the home solar battery market, addressing the growing demand for sustainable energy solutions. The PowerStream maximizes energy utilization and minimizes waste.
green_innovation: TRUE, because the EcoFlow PowerStream contributes to environmental sustainability by offering a solar energy solution that reduces reliance on traditional power sources, minimizes waste, and promotes the use of renewable energy.
business_innovation: TRUE, because the EcoFlow PowerStream represents a new product offering that significantly differs from the company's previous products by entering the home solar battery market.
green_product: TRUE, because the EcoFlow PowerStream is designed and manufactured to significantly reduce environmental impact through its provision of renewable energy and its capabilities to minimize waste throughout its life cycle.
green_process: TRUE, because the installation and operation of the PowerStream involves a process that minimizes environmental impacts, including the use of renewable resources and efficient energy utilization.
